import InputCheckOut from '@components/input-checkout'; import url from "@assets/image/avt3.png" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import InputCheckBox from '@components/input-checkbox'; import InputRadio from '@components/input-radio'; import ButtonAll from '@components/button-account'; import FromInputCheckOut from '@layoutStore/form-input-checkout'; const FormCheckOut = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
LCD Monitor
$650
{t('total')}

); }; export default FormCheckOut;
